amendment.description: Amendment increases civic education funding by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 15 in the Congressional Record of July 29, 1997, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Health and Human Services Office of Inspector General by $1 million and to increase funding for the "We the People Project Citizen education program commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 3 (Roll no. 376).
